com.okaycamera.okcameralibrary

类 OkCameraManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.okaycamera.okcameralibrary.OkCameraManager

  • public class OkCameraManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a single instance class, to hack CameraManger use event bus
    版本:
    0.0.1
    作者:
    jianguo yang

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  OkCameraManager.CameraAvailableMessage
      The Event bus message for listen camera device available
      class  OkCameraManager.CameraDisconnectedMessage
      The Event bus message for listen camera device disconnect
      class  OkCameraManager.CameraOpenedMessage
      The Event bus message for listen camera device opened
      class  OkCameraManager.CameraOpenErrorMessage
      The Event bus message for listen camera device open error

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法

      Query the capabilities of a camera device.
      java.lang.String[] getCameraIdList()

      The camera manager instance

      You can subscribe OkCameraManager.CameraOpenedMessage and OkCameraManager.CameraOpenErrorMessage to listen open Camera event

      You can subscribe OkCameraManager.CameraAvailableMessage to listen camera availability events
      void sendMessageDelayed(android.os.Message msg, long delayTime)

    • 方法详细资料

      • instance

        public static OkCameraManager instance(android.content.Context context)
        The camera manager instance
        参数:
        context - must be a application context
        返回:
        camera manager instance

      • getCameraIdList

        public java.lang.String[] getCameraIdList()
                                   throws android.hardware.camera2.CameraAccessException
        a proxy of CameraManager.getCameraIdList() Return the list of currently connected camera devices by identifier, including cameras that may be in use by other camera API clients.

        Non-removable cameras use integers starting at 0 for their identifiers, while removable cameras have a unique identifier for each individual device, even if they are the same model.

        返回:
        The list of currently connected camera devices.
        抛出:
        android.hardware.camera2.CameraAccessException
        另请参阅:
        CameraManager.getCameraIdList()

      • getCameraCharacteristics

        public android.hardware.camera2.CameraCharacteristics getCameraCharacteristics(@NonNull
                                                                               java.lang.String cameraId)
                                                                        throws android.hardware.camera2.CameraAccessException

        Query the capabilities of a camera device. These capabilities are immutable for a given camera.

        参数:
        cameraId - The id of the camera device to query
        返回:
        The properties of the given camera
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the cameraId does not match any known camera device.
        android.hardware.camera2.CameraAccessException - if the camera device has been disconnected.
        另请参阅:
        getCameraIdList(), android.app.admin.DevicePolicyManager#setCameraDisabled

      • openCamera

        public void openCamera(java.lang.String cameraId)
                throws android.hardware.camera2.CameraAccessException
        You can subscribe OkCameraManager.CameraOpenedMessage and OkCameraManager.CameraOpenErrorMessage to listen open Camera event
        参数:
        cameraId - which camera been opened
        抛出:
        android.hardware.camera2.CameraAccessException - if dose not has the camera permission, it will throw this exception

      • registerCameraAvailability

        public void registerCameraAvailability()
        You can subscribe OkCameraManager.CameraAvailableMessage to listen camera availability events
        另请参阅:
        OkCameraManager.CameraAvailableMessage

      • unregisterCameraAvailability

        public void unregisterCameraAvailability()
        The pair method of registerCameraAvailability()
        另请参阅:
        registerCameraAvailability()

      • sendMessageDelayed

        public void sendMessageDelayed(android.os.Message msg,
                               long delayTime)

      • sendMessageImmediately

        public void sendMessageImmediately(android.os.Message msg)
